name: Web Page IOC Scraper
description: This plugin is used to pull IOCs of type URL, Domain, IPv4, IPv6, MD5 and SHA256 from any public website. This plugin does not support sharing of IOCs or performing any actions.

configuration.label: Website URL
configuration.description: Add URL of public website from where you want to pull data.

configuration.label: Type of Threat data to pull
configuration.description: Type of Threat data to pull. Allowed values are SHA256, MD5, URL, Domain, IPv4, IPv6.
